description: Seinco is an engineering company providing the entire chain of services linked to the environmental water cycle for large infrastructure projects.
Selfit is a value-for-money gym chain operating in Brazil, offering high quality equipment, group fitness classes, and top notch customer service at affordable rates.

SellersFunding is an alternative working capital solution for e-commerce marketplace sellers. Its digital platform helps merchants unlock their full growth potential through a suite of financial solutions that streamline merchants’ ability to sell almost anywhere in the world.
Sempre Sementes researches genetics and biotechnology to produce seeds with higher crop yields.
Sendmarc automates the process of protecting clients from email phishing and spoofing attacks using DMARC Compliance, Intelligence, and Authenticated Email.
Sentinel is a Peruvian credit bureau that takes a proactive approach to traditional credit monitoring. It was acquired by Experian in 2019.
Servi-All provides alternative essential inventory management services to Chile’s industrial and mining operations, enabling effective operational continuity and efficiency.

Servinformación develops geographic information systems (GIS), data analytics, and cloud services, transforming clients’ data and generating value with high impact solutions to make better business decisions.
SFA CEBAR offers services to farmers and ranches that enable them to access financial products to structure productive projects.
Shawarmer is a chain of fast-casual restaurants offering shawarma and other classic Arab foods, freshly prepared with high-quality ingredients and served with Arab hospitality.

ShopFully is a mobile-first marketplace helping people find the best deals from nearby stores and all the information they need for a frictionless shopping experience. It is also a place for retailers and brands to engage with the shoppers when they are most open to exploring new shopping opportunities.
Si-Ware Systems manufactures portable material sending solutions that combine sensors with a cloud-based marketplace & App Store for the agriculture, food, life sciences industries.
Siigo provides accounting and management software solutions to small businesses.
Sirtec builds, operates, and maintains electricity networks for the states of Rio Grande do Sul, Bahia, and Ceará in Brazil.
SiSNova is an insurance company focused on disease prevention and offers comprehensive, accessible, and affordable medical coverage.
Sistema Biobolsa (Sistema.bio) enables farmers to use waste products to produce fertilizer and bio gas with a carbon negative, on-site biodigester.
Skapto is Bulgaria’s largest gourmet burger chain serving handcrafted, high-quality burgers in a fast-casual dining environment.
SkuVault is a cloud-based inventory and warehouse management system that helps ecommerce retailers unlock the potential of their inventory.

SkyAlert has developed the first fully-integrated, satellite-based earthquake alert system in the world that detects, measures, and reports seismic activity directly to end users through multiple platforms.
Skynamo helps manufacturers, wholesalers and distributors gain clarity and control of their field sales process through advanced reporting and automated tracking.
